alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Lower Kobuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 12 at 2:44PM AKST until November 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk Valley and Baldwin Peninsula. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves will push onshore, especially along south and west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night into Tuesday. Sustained south to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph late tonight through Monday night will shift to the west on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property. Items on the beach should be moved to higher ground to prevent damage or being washed away.
